thread.title: Bach calls for 'external' candidate to take over FIFA
thread.title_full: Bach calls for 'external' candidate to take over FIFA

title: Bach calls for 'external' candidate to take over FIFA
text:
> Top News Bach calls for 'external' candidate to take over FIFA FILE - In this May 29, 2015 file photo FIFA president Sepp Blatter, right, shakes hands with senior Vice President Issa Hayatou during the 65th FIFA Congress held at the Hallenstadion in Zurich, Switzerland. FIFA said Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015 that African soccer leader Isaa Hayatou will serve as acting president after Blatter has been banned for 90 days. (Patrick B. Kraemer/Keystone via AP) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
